title: Region bounded by sinx, cosx, and y-axis part - a

content.description: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y =sin x and y =cos x , as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the area of R

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using ƒ'(x), y', and dy/dx).
